definition: Czech/Czech Republic/abbr. for 捷克[Jie2 ke4]

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: You can drop and drag the shortcut to other locations.
sentences.chinese: 你可以下拉并拖动创建的快捷方式到其他地方。

sentences.english: This shortcut works in all dialog palettes.
sentences.chinese: 这个快捷方式适用于所有的数值输入框。
你知道更多的快捷方式？

sentences.english: Badware can even add desktop shortcuts to your PC.
sentences.chinese: 恶意软件甚至可以添加桌面快捷方式到您的PC。

sentences.english: Sends a shortcut to the current page using mail.
sentences.chinese: 使用邮件发送指向当前页的快捷方式。

sentences.english: To edit a shortcut, double-click it and type a new one.
sentences.chinese: 欲编辑某个快捷方式，只需双击并键入一组新的。

sentences.english: The flying fish shortcut isn't available to all particles.
sentences.chinese: 飞鱼的快捷方式并不对所有的粒子都有效。

sentences.english: Double-click one of the desktop shortcuts you just created.
sentences.chinese: 双击刚才创建的桌面快捷方式之一。

sentences.english: Key-press shortcuts for all major functions.
sentences.chinese: 为所有主要功能提供快捷方式。

sentences.english: Now, you can set the initial scope beforehand, as a shortcut.
sentences.chinese: 现在，您可以先设置初始的范围作为一种快捷方式。

sentences.english: Add shortcuts to web pages and even to folders on your computer for quick access .
sentences.chinese: 添加网页或电脑资料夹的快捷方式，以便快速访问。

sentences.english: Feel free to include some other useful shortcuts in the comments section.
sentences.chinese: 如有其它有用的快捷方式请随意添加到评论栏里。

definition: drive letter (letter assigned to a disk drive or partition) (computing)
Save As ... (menu option in a software application)
